attributes.action: The UK and its allies should place sanctions on Israel and Burma for oppression.
attributes.additional_details:
Myanmar's Rohingya Are in Crisis
https://news.nationalgeographic.com/2017/09/rohingya-refugee-crisis-myanmar-burma-spd/

Rohingya Crisis continues - Donate
http://alimdaad.com/content/projectdetails.jsf?id=346

https://www.hrw.org/news/2017/06/04/israel-50-years-occupation-abuses

Palestine - Donate

attributes.background: Recently the UK and its allies spent Tax payers money to bomb certain locations in Syria where there was impeding evidence to show that a chemical attack upon civilians was staged. On the contrary we are certain of the oppression and illegal displacement of mass civilians within Palestine and Burma.

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. Your petition mentions military action in Syria, so we're not sure exactly what kind of sanctions you have in mind.

If you'd like specific sanctions or embargoes, you could start a new petition asking for the action you'd like to see. You can find out more here:

https://www.gov.uk/guidance/sanctions-embargoes-and-restrictions
